response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is considerably below its market value. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
